channel.title: I have a command problem
channel.description:
Okay.....
I made a command for barrows...basically all it is is a very basic command "addItem, teleportX and Y, and sendMessage." The command is fine...because when I use my Owner account I teleport and recieve item...all good....but when I use one of my noob accounts or any1 else...It doesn't work for them....and there isn't a PlayerRights part......ANY IDEA??

item.title: I have a command problem
item.dc:creator: @I_X_Wolf_X_I I X Wolf X I
item.description:
@I_X_Wolf_X_I wrote:

[quote=“Unid H4x0r, post:8, topic:147993”]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“COMMANDNAME”) && playerRights >=0) if its for everyone it would matter about teh: && playerRights >=0)[/quote]yeah… and if(command.equalsignorecase("COMMANDNAME") && playerRights >=0) is for like if you dont want ::noclip to work… like if you want it to send them to an invalid area to sit in the dark or something then put if(command.equalsignorecase("COMMANDNAME") && playerRights >=0) in commands.txt but sometimes it wont always work because some servers require source builders.

Read full topic

item.title: I have a command problem
item.dc:creator: @Unid_H4x0r Unid H4x0r
item.description:
@Unid_H4x0r wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“COMMANDNAME”) && playerRights >=0) if its for everyone it would matter about teh: && playerRights >=0)

item.title: I have a command problem
item.dc:creator: @I_X_Wolf_X_I I X Wolf X I
item.description:
@I_X_Wolf_X_I wrote:

[quote=“eclipse245, post:1, topic:147993”]Okay…

I made a command for barrows…basically all it is is a very basic command “addItem, teleportX and Y, and sendMessage.” The command is fine…because when I use my Owner account I teleport and recieve item…all good…but when I use one of my noob accounts or any1 else…It doesn’t work for them…and there isn’t a PlayerRights part…ANY IDEA??[/quote] add this if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("COMMANDNAME") && playerRights >=0)

Read full topic

item.title: I have a command problem
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Yes it would matter. If you have it with a section of codes specifically for playerRights >= 2, it’ll affect it. Put a playerRights >= 0 on the command.

Read full topic

item.description:
@eclipse245 wrote:

that shouldn’t matter…and no I am not.

item.title: I have a command problem
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Maybe you’re adding it to a section of your commands that’s for a certain playerRights.
like if (playerRights >= 2)
all your commands under here

Read full topic
